name: Jeff Hardy Champion Dash Background

user.name: kazoos-rule
user.about:
Hey guys, Elle here.

My dash backgrounds are made for monitors with 1024 by 600 pixels, I have a mini laptop. If your screen is bigger and you would like me to resize any of the dash backgrounds, feel free to ask me at http://kazoos-rule.tumblr.com/ask I'll do it, no problem. 

There's a link to the .gif I used to make the background so you can see it before downloading. It'd be much appreciated if you didn't steal any of my work. Thanks.

So yeah, that's pretty much it. I do take requests, so if you have anything in mind, feel free to let me know. (http://kazoos-rule.tumblr.com/ask)

Thanks guys~
